definition: a Beerothite or inhabitant of Beeroth

translations.de: ein Beerothit oder Einwohner von Beeroth
translations.el: ένας Beerothite ή κάτοικος του Beeroth
translations.es: un beerothita o habitante de Beeroth
translations.fr: un Beerothite ou habitant de Beeroth
translations.it: un Beerothite o un abitante di Beeroth
translations.ja: ベアロス人またはベアロスの住民
translations.nb: en beerothitt eller innbygger i Beeroth
translations.nl: een Beerothiet of inwoner van Beeroth
translations.pt: um Beerothite ou habitante de Beeroth
translations.ro: un Beerothit sau locuitor al Beeroth

translations.tr: bir Beerothlu ya da Beeroth sakini
translations.zh: 贝罗特人或贝罗特居民
